page.title: 14Eversley's Mobile Library
page.content: {Eversley}is a small village and many people rely on the mobile library for local information as well as for borrowing books. The library's base is at{Fleet.}The County Council owns the van and all the books. There are about six thousand books at the mobile library, and they are changed regularly. About a hundred people use the library in a week and they look after the books well, as not many are damaged. The library has the same driver most of the time. We saw eight people choosing books while we were there. They had a very wide choice, fiction and non-fiction. The librarians sold bookmarks and badges and gave free vouchers for a local leisure and fun park.
